QuestData.Title: Honor Our Fallen
QuestData.Description:
The djaradin have no regard for the sanctity of the Citadel or the bodies of our kin! They break the bones of the dead and take their personal keepsakes as souvenirs.
This disrespect cuts at the heart of every proud black dragon. They deserve honor.
Recover these items that the djaradin have stripped from the bodies of our fallen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa Fallen Defenders Ring, $2oa Earth-Warder's Flame Blade and $3oa Horn of Scorxia
